channel.title: The Great Books
channel.description: Hillsdale College’s John J. Miller discusses classic works within the Western literary canon.
channel.itunes:summary: Hillsdale College’s John J. Miller discusses classic works within the Western literary canon.
channel.itunes:author: National Review
channel.itunes:keywords: national review, books, book review, conservatism, novels, classic books, conservative

item.title: Episode 250: 'Romeo and Juliet' by William Shakespeare

item.itunes:keywords: books, shakespeare, plays, romeo and juliet, great books, laura bates, national review
